message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob, but I have to make a living, too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm going to counter with $1100000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm willing to go up to $950000. Can you meet me there?

I see you're still a bit off on the price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to think about my bottom line. I'll meet you at $1050000. That's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm willing to go up to $980000. Can you meet me there?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'll meet you at $1020000. That's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm willing to go up to $990000. Can you meet me there?

I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll meet you at $1015000. That's my last offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options. What do you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my maximum budget. I'm willing to go up to $990000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
